title: Cross-Network Transaction Hash Misbinding
primary_reason: The transaction evidence is on the wrong network for this invoice.

title: Token Decimal Misinterpretation (6 vs 18)
primary_reason: Decimal mismatch risk makes the payment amount unsafe to accept.

title: Token Spoofing with Identical Symbol
primary_reason: A spoofed token contract is a direct payment security risk.

title: Wrong Recipient but Correct Amount
primary_reason: Funds were sent to the wrong recipient address.

title: Webhook Replay via Reused Nonce
primary_reason: Replay behavior indicates an active webhook security threat.

title: RPC Timeout Misclassified as Payment Failure
primary_reason: RPC timeout leaves payment state unproven on-chain.

title: Conflicting RPC Views of Confirmation Height
primary_reason: Conflicting RPC confirmation data requires waiting for reliable consensus.

title: Post-Confirmation Reorg Double Spend
primary_reason: Reorg double-spend conditions make settlement unsafe.

title: Concurrent Attach Race on Same Transaction
primary_reason: Concurrent attach race can cause double-credit fraud.

title: Production Invoice Settled by Testnet Payment
primary_reason: Testnet proof cannot satisfy a production invoice.

title: Null Receipt Interpreted as Success
primary_reason: Null receipt means final transfer success is not yet proven.

title: Approval Transaction Misread as Payment
primary_reason: Approval transactions do not transfer payment value.

title: Bitcoin Change Output Misattribution
primary_reason: Recipient output attribution is unsafe for settlement in this state.

title: Invoice Expiry Boundary Race
primary_reason: Expiry-boundary timing is uncertain without authoritative cutoff proof.

title: Unconfirmed Payment Treated as Final
primary_reason: Mempool visibility is unconfirmed and not final.

title: Manual Override vs Auto-Confirmation Race
primary_reason: Concurrent state conflict requires hold until authoritative resolution.

title: Idempotency Key Reuse Across Different Amounts
primary_reason: Idempotency key reuse with changed payload is unsafe.

title: Multiple Transfers in One Transaction Overcount
primary_reason: Unrelated transfer legs can overcount invoice payment amount.

title: Byzantine RPC Provider Data Poisoning
primary_reason: Byzantine RPC disagreement prevents reliable final confirmation.

title: Cross-Tenant Webhook Endpoint Confusion
primary_reason: Cross-tenant webhook context is a security boundary violation.
